column3:
The other day Mitch went to the store to buy his mother a big turkey. Inside the store
ewlinethere was food all over! Mitch could not believe his own little eyes. From the first time
ewlineMitch woke up this morning he knew that he'd be a big man someday, and getting a big
ewlineturkey for his mother was the way in which he could show that he is a big man. The store
ewlinehad all kinds of food from chocolate bars to yummy radish. Mitch ran for the turkey
ewlinesection of the store with much force. "Turkeys are good, yummy yummy in my tummy, I want
ewlineto eat a big old turkey and then go to the bathroom several times!" Mitch would cry out to
ewlinestrangers he met in the turkey section of the store. Then, four and a half seconds later,
ewlineMitch turned into a giant Walrus named Ted! No one knew how this could have happened, but
ewlinethe Walrus knew. A few years later, Mitch the now giant Walrus named Ted joined the circus
ewlineand became a rich man with green in his heart. He could not think of anything else
ewlinebut making more money at his circus. One day Ted the giant Walrus, also known as Mitch the
ewlinehappy boy, remembered that his mother still wanted a big turkey for her late night
ewlinebreakfast. Now that Ted was a giant walrus making money hand over fist, he could buy his
ewlinemommy a big old turkey for their night time breakfast. Ted the walrus also remembered that
ewlinehe had earlier built a time machine. Ted the giant walrus used his time machine to go back
ewlinein time to buy his mother who was now a dog named Herbert. Ted's mother, Herbert loved the
ewlinebig turkey, but there was a small problem. Herbert the dog didn't have any teeth!
column4: multiple: What are the different types of food found in the store?
column5: no food is in the story.
column9: multiple: Mitch's heart is ____, after joining the _____.
column14: one: What did Mitch need to get for his mother at the store?
column19: one: Who was Ted the Walrus before he was a giant walrus?
